Title: Potential Recipe ideas

Title: New recipe day!

Title: I've Worked it out!
Text: Dear @^ Eureka!^^ I have found a way to bottle products!^ I have encountered a slight hiccup though. The blueprints for the machine i am sending you requires the use of glass bottles. Unfortunately I haven't found a way to make them from scratch yet^^ If you come across any glass bottles, feel free to give this new machine a go! -Barry Wong
